WorkItem.ClosedComment: We discussed this and although it can be inconvenient. we prefer to be on the latest builds and have bugs we encounter fixed.
WorkItem.Description:
Yesterday, mde released a [new version of utilities 0.0.30](https://npmjs.org/package/utilities) (a dependency of jake) that causes new builds of TS to fail.

I've opened an issue already [here](https://github.com/mde/utilities/issues/12) with a resolution. Someone else has since opened a PR with a (proper?) fix.

If it's a big deal to the TS devs that they don't get impacted by dependencies breaking like this, perhaps you want to look at [npm-shrinkwrap](https://npmjs.org/doc/shrinkwrap.html) instead of using "jake: latest" in package.json

Comments.Message: Thanks for reporting, we're taking a look at your suggestion.
mde has since released v0.0.31 of utilities with the issue fixed.
